About Rock

Rock is a genre that has captured my musical interest with its distinctive characteristics and artistic expression. This collection features 34 tracks from 4 different artists, spanning across 12 albums. The genre showcases a diverse range of styles and interpretations, each track contributing to the rich tapestry of Rock music. With a total of 3483 plays, these tracks represent some of the most engaging and memorable music in this genre from my collection.
